methods.name: getGlobalConfig
methods.rawdescription: Retrieves the global configuration for a specific fragment type.
methods.description: Retrieves the global configuration for a specific fragment type.

jsdoctags.comment: • The fragment type on which the managed object type corresponds.
A promise that resolves in the first global configuration managed object.

methods.name: getGlobalParam
methods.description: Retrieves whether an object should include the c8y_Global fragment in its declaration. If the fragment is set to false it should return false; If the fragment is set to true it should return true; If no fragment is available it should return true;

jsdoctags.comment: A promise that resolves into a boolean value indicating whether the global parameter should be set.
